players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Bob, you killed Charlie. I investigated you and found you mafia. Vote for me."
You: "Diana, you lied about Bob. Bob is dead, so you can't be mafia. Vote for me."
Bob: "Alice, you are the only one who knows Bob is mafia. That means you are the detective. But you are not. So you must be mafia."
You: remained silent.
Diana: "Alice, you know Bob killed Charlie. I investigated him and he's mafia. Vote Bob."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
Diana was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Bob, you killed Charlie. I investigated you and found you mafia. Vote for me."
Alice: "Diana, you lied about Bob. Bob is dead, so you can't be mafia. Vote for me."
You: "Alice, you are the only one who knows Bob is mafia. That means you are the detective. But you are not. So you must be mafia."
Alice: remained silent.
Diana: "Alice, you know Bob killed Charlie. I investigated him and he's mafia. Vote Bob."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
Diana was arrested

players.name: Diana

Alice: "Diana, you lied about Bob. Bob is dead, so you can't be mafia. Vote for me."
Bob: "Alice, you are the only one who knows Bob is mafia. That means you are the detective. But you are not. So you must be mafia."
